verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Now you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> what I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> for by a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> he shall let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and by a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> he shall drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land.<s%>"
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "I am Yahweh;

and I <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> as <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty;<s%> but by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> I was not known to <S%H3045>them.<s%>

I have also <S%H6965>established<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5414>them,<s%> to give them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4033>travels,<s%> in which they lived as <S%H1481>aliens.<s%>

Moreover I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5009>groaning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> keep in <S%H5647>bondage,<s%> and I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'I am Yahweh, and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from under the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and I will <S%H5337>rid<s%> you out of their <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> and I will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments:<s%>

and I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you to me for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be to you a <S%H430>God;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3318>brings<s%> you out from under the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5375>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you for a <S%H4181>heritage:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> so to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for <S%H7115>anguish<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and for <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H5656>bondage.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H935>"Go<s%> <S%H1696>in,<s%> speak to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> go <S%H7971>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1121>"Behold,<s%> the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>haven't<s%> listened to <S%H6547>me.<s%> How then shall Pharaoh <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H589>me,<s%> who am of <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H8193>lips?<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and gave them a <S%H6680>command<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

These are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi;<s%> these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel,<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> and <S%H161>Ohad,<s%> and <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> and <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanite <S%H3669>woman;<s%> these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations:<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon:<s%> <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath:<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3878>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations.<s%>

<S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3115>Jochebed<s%> his <S%H1733>father<s%>'s sister to himself as <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar:<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel:<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan,<s%> and <S%H5644>Sithri.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H472>Elisheba,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon,<s%> as his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah:<s%> <S%H617>Assir,<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> and <S%H23>Abiasaph;<s%> these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites.<s%>

<S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> one of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6317>Putiel<s%> as his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H6372>Phinehas.<s%> These are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

<S%H1931>These<s%> are that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>"

<S%H1992>These<s%> are those who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> These are that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
It happened on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all that I speak to <S%H1696>you.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6189>"Behold,<s%> I am of uncircumcised <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and how shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> listen to <S%H8085>me?<s%>"
